mil5.5.10:1.2_0: ‘tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāyā’ti.
mil5.5.10:1.3_0: Puna ca ‘sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāyā’ti.
mil5.5.10:2.1_2: issāso vā issāsantevāsī vā bahuke divase saṅgāmatthāya upāsanaṁ sikkhitvā sampatte mahāyuddhe osakkeyya;
mil5.5.10:2.2_2: tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācetvā
mil5.5.10:2.2_3: mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya sabbaññutaṁ pattena dhammadesanāya osakkitaṁ.
mil5.5.10:3.1_2: mallo vā mallantevāsī vā bahuke divase nibbuddhaṁ sikkhitvā sampatte mallayuddhe osakkeyya;
mil5.5.10:3.2_2: tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācetvā
mil5.5.10:3.2_3: mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya sabbaññutaṁ pattena dhammadesanāya osakkitaṁ.
mil5.5.10:4.1_7: iṅgha me tvaṁ kāraṇaṁ brūhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇāya.
mil5.5.10:4.2_2: tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya,
mil5.5.10:4.2_3: tena hi ‘sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami,
mil5.5.10:4.3_0: Yadi sabbaññutaṁ pattassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami no dhammadesanāya,
mil5.5.10:4.3_1: tena hi ‘tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ paripācitaṁ
mil5.5.10:4.3_2: mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāyā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.5.10:4.4_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gambhīro dunnibbeṭho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.10:5.1_1: tathāgatena catūhi ca asaṅkhyeyyehi kappānaṁ satasahassena ca etthantare sabbaññutañāṇaṁ mahato janakāyassa samuddharaṇāya,
mil5.5.10:5.2_0: Tañca pana dhammassa gambhīranipuṇaduddasaduranubodhasukhumaduppaṭivedhataṁ sattānañca ālayārāmataṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā
mil5.5.10:5.2_2: kathaṁ nu kho’ti appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami,
mil5.5.10:6.1_1: bhisakko sallakatto anekabyādhiparipīḷitaṁ naraṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ cintayati ‘kena nu kho upakkamena
mil5.5.10:6.1_2: katamena vā bhesajjena imassa byādhi vūpasameyyā’ti;
mil5.5.10:6.2_1: tathāgatassa sabbakilesabyādhiparipīḷitaṁ janaṁ dhammassa ca gambhīranipuṇaduddasaduranubodhasukhumaduppaṭivedhataṁ disvā ‘kiṁ nu kho,
mil5.5.10:6.2_2: kathaṁ nu kho’ti appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami,
mil5.5.10:7.1_1: rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa dovārikaanīkaṭṭhapārisajjanegamabhaṭabalaamaccarājaññarājūpajīvine jane disvā evaṁ cittamuppajjeyya ‘kiṁ nu kho,
mil5.5.10:7.2_3: kathaṁ nu kho’ti appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami,
mil5.5.10:8.1_0: Api ca, mahārāja, sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ dhammatā esā, yaṁ brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desenti.
mil5.5.10:8.3_0: Ye tena samayena manussā tāpasaparibbājakā samaṇabrāhmaṇā,
mil5.5.10:8.3_2: tasmā tassa balavato yasavato ñātassa paññātassa uttarassa accuggatassa onamanena sadevako loko onamissati okappessati adhimuccissatīti iminā ca, mahārāja,
mil5.5.10:8.3_3: kāraṇena tathāgatā brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desenti.
mil5.5.10:9.1_1: koci rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā yassa onamati apacitiṁ karoti,
mil5.5.10:9.1_2: balavatarassa tassa onamanena avasesā janatā onamati apacitiṁ karoti;
mil5.5.10:9.2_1: brahme onamite tathāgatānaṁ sadevako loko onamissati,
mil5.5.10:9.2_3: tasmā so brahmā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ āyācati dhammadesanāya,
mil5.5.10:9.2_4: tena ca kāraṇena tathāgatā brahmunā āyācitā dhammaṁ desentī”ti.
